Event.EventName: You see a free table with empty glasses on it.

EventOption.EventOptionDescription: Move the glasses and put them on the bar.
EventOption.EventOptionPostDescription: You saved the bar staff from having to clean the table but by touching the glasses you have increased your chances of catching the virus.

EventOption.EventOptionDescription: Ask the bar staff to clean the table for you.
EventOption.EventOptionPostDescription: By getting the bar staff to clean the table you have reduced your chance of catching the virus.
